page.title: 01Cropthorne and District
page.content: This is a rural area, situated in the heart of the{Vale of Evesham.}The {Evesham-Pershore}road crosses the block and the{River Avon}runs through the village of Cropthorne. The main features are{Farming and Market {Gardening}so most of the land is covered by fields. Three, small, pretty villages{Cropthorne,Little {Comberton and Wick}occupy some of the area. There is a church in each village but only Cropthorne has a school. Another characteristic is the large number of{Black and White {Cottages}and several large, old houses of various periods. Most of them with beautiful gardens.
